events.description: 4-P.Dawson kicks 56 yards from SF 35 to CHI 9. 14-D.Thompson to CHI 37 for 28 yards (25-J.Ward). FUMBLES (25-J.Ward), RECOVERED by SF-25-J.Ward at CHI 37. 25-J.Ward to CHI 37 for no gain (14-D.Thompson). The Replay Official reviewed the fumble ruling, and the play was Upheld.
